title: Pixel invite to secret community
content:
I hear there is a gathering of people(invitation only) to a community of people that are in the Pixel research groups. I'm here to ask how do I get to be a part of this?! I'm a dedicated Google user, been one since 1999 since I was in middle school I've had a account with you this company. Please give me a answer to how to be a part of this. I only ask you this cause I have to be "in the know" about the next and in the future to come of the Pixel phones as well as the tech savy of the 21st century Google has to offer to help the humanity stay advanced in keeping our future to come for ad long as we humans are to live. I'm looking to work for you guys here in the next year once I have some money to finish up school and move to California were one of the HQ are at. 

Thank you for your consideration and time with helping me towards a better future in my education as well as for the Google community and future of technology only bettering the human's future to live another day on this places we call Earth.
